intro: This Product User Manual (PUM) serves as a comprehensive guide to the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) Urban Atlas Building Block Height Model (UA BBHM) 2012 product. It details the scope, methodology, and potential applications of this dataset, which provides harmonised building height data for 870 cities and urban centres across the EEA38 region. Users will find valuable information regarding the dataset's characteristics, quality assessment procedures, technical specifications, and its use in urban analysis and policy support.
